ModMetaData.name: Easy Load Transports
ModMetaData.author: scott2521
ModMetaData.description: This will instantly load your drop pods, SRTS ships, etc. Thanks to Ferny. I got the idea when I came across his Easy Caravan Formation mod. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3165744287 I just modified his mod to have the same functionality for Drop pods (and similar vehicles)
